Home.intro: Tôi là một Nhà phát triển Frontend tại Việt Nam, xây dựng cho web với tư duy thiết kế đầu tiên.

About.intro: I'm Tan Luc! Originally from Viet Nam, I'm now based in the vibrant place that is Ho Chi Minh City.
About.career: My curiosity for computers began at age 14, which naturally led me to pursue a career in tech. I've been working as a frontend developer, specializing in full-stack development and design, for {years} years now!
About.hobbies: When I'm not at my desk, you can find me at the gym, running or enjoying some coffee at a local shop!
About.work: I specialize in Typescript, React, web development, UI/UX, and product design. But I am always learning new things. Here are some of the places I have worked.
